scenario_text.value: Is everyone ready? We’re all here, right?!

Hey Takuma, I saw you just now. Were you
copying me by thanking the school building?
(Ulp, she saw me? What do I say?)
I had to say thanks.
I wanted to do it too.
Now I’m embarrassed.
I had to say thanks.

You know, I thought about it, and I realized
I had to say thanks.
Yeah, see? It’s important to be polite.
You’re right, Miu. That’s very important.
I wanted to do it too.

Yeah, sorry, but when I thought about how
this is the end, I wanted to do it too.

Well, you didn’t have to be so shy about it.
Why’d you go off and do it on your own?

You know, you’re right. It’s not something
you should have to do on your own.
Now I’m embarrassed.

Ahaha, I feel kind of embarrassed now.
I didn’t think anyone was watching.

Hey, you’ve got nothing to be embarrassed
about. It’s important to show appreciation.

Everyone, I have a suggestion. Why don’t we
all give this place a fond farewell?

Are you serious?! You actually want us to say
goodbye to the school?!
Ugh, talk about embarrassing, right?

Is it, though? If it weren’t for this place,
we never would have made it out here.

Fine, I guess we’re doing this. It’s tough
being the voice of reas—uh, Renamon?!

What? Are you so surprised? This place holds
a lot of meaning for me and Miyuki.

Yes, I’m sure it does. Now, I’m making this
mandatory. Everyone line up!
Attention!
Thanks for everything!
Thank you!!!
Okay, let’s go! Time to <color=#B41919>move out</color>.
(We won’t be coming back here again.)

(We leave now not only to fight our final
battle...)
(...but to return to our world.)
